item.title: Dow bounces 800 points Friday on encouraging inflation data after rough week: Live updates
item.description: All three major averages were still on track for sharp losses on the week.

item.title: Bitcoin falls 5% in volatile trade around $96,000 as sell-off intensifies
item.description: Bitcoin fell sharply on Friday amid broader caution in risk assets.

item.title: Government shutdown live updates: Congress scrambles to reach spending deal before Saturday
Tesla reverses losses to turn higher in a volatile week for the EV stock
item.description: Tesla on Friday reversed losses from earlier in the day to trade higher, putting the electric vehicle maker's stock on track to post a weekly gain.

item.title: Trump transfers all his DJT shares to his revocable trust, new SEC filings show
item.description: Donald Trump's shares in Trump Media, owner of the Truth Social app, were worth about $4 billion, the largest portion of his net worth.
